content.question: At line 9 (“Yet truly . . . abide”), the poem shifts from

choices.label: depicting a natural phenomenon to discussing how nature benefits human beings
illustrating a particular human experience to explaining the value underlying that experience
presenting a conflict between humankind and the natural world to proposing a resolution between them
describing a behavior to correcting a common misunderstanding of the motives behind that behavior

content.answer: illustrating a particular human experience to explaining the value underlying that experience

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
